title: soy sauce chow mein
ingredients: 3-4 oz bean sprouts; washed and drained
2 green onion; sliced in 1-2 inch segments on a bias
instructions: Cook noodles in salted water until very al dente.
While noodles are cooking, fry eggs in neutral oil and mix together both soy and sesame oil to make the sauce.

Reuse the pan from the fried eggs (wipe out if needed) and bring back up to heat with a splash of neutral oil. Once hot, toss noodles for 1-2 minutes. Add green onion, bean sprouts and sauce and toss for another 2 minutes until everything is well combined and heated through.
Serve in bowls topped with fried eggs and sesame seeds.
